member.name: IRichChunk.GetData
member.summary: Retrieves the and input string that represents a chunk of data.
member.param: Receives the zero-based starting position of the range. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives the length of the range. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives the associated Unicode string value, or NULL if not available.
Receives the associated value, or VT_EMPTY if not available. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRichChunk
member.summary: Represents a chunk of data as a string and a value.
